mainText:
Steve Jobs has honestly influenced my life so much. I'm proud to say I'm 
emailing this message right now on my Macbook Pro, with my iTouch, iPod 
Nano, and Macbook are close by. It took one man to change technology 
forever. He made such an impact on every customer, always with pleasing 
products. I remember how upset I was after hearing he had resigned from 
his position, only to find out months later, he had passed away. He was 
a great man with a talent and passion for technology like no other.
author: Sami
